Exam.Description: Here we are. Are you ready? Don't worry, we've prepared some tips to help you prepare for exams.

Tips.Organize subjects based on difficulty an: Organize subjects based on difficulty and priority.
Tips.Set daily study goals to avoid last-minu: Set daily study goals to avoid last-minute cramming.
Summarize key points in your own words.
Tips.Create flashcards, mind maps, or mnemoni: Create flashcards, mind maps, or mnemonics.
Tips.Teach someone else or explain concepts o: Teach someone else or explain concepts out loud.
Tips.Time yourself to improve speed and accur: Time yourself to improve speed and accuracy.
